resources.string:
Features:
 - Strikingly beautiful skies with realistic clouds!
 - New charming water with waves, flares and lots of shades!
 - The shadows of the clouds!
 - 3D Fog (appears at night, and is generated in the caves) (older versions)
 - The glow of precious ores (in older versions)
 - Outbreaks in the clouds at night (in older versions)
 - Increasing and changing the blur of sun and moon
 - The effect of swaying underwater landscape
 - Altered lightning (blue color, variable brightness and more traffic)
 - Blurring grass, glass, etc. away
 - Superior rain: drops blur and the wind, which tilts the rain
 - The unusual atmosphere in the Lower World thanks to new light and lava
 - Smoothed shadows that change depending on time of day, fog and rain
 - Modified artificial light
 - Changes in natural light: sunlight, sunset, cloudy and moonlight
 - Foliage, grass, water lilies, vines, a hell of a build-up and the flames move
 - Change the lighting of torches: it is on the edges of a Red + shake the world, like fire.
 - Support for the use of other texture packs
